Package Items

Class ItemObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • GameObjects.GameObject
      • Items.ItemObject
  • public class ItemObject
extends GameObject
    This class is used to add items to the map

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private java.awt.image.BufferedImage itemImage  
      private java.lang.String itemName

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ItemObject​(int x, int y, ID id, java.lang.String itemName)
      This constructor loads the item into a new GameObject so that it can be used by the handler.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ItemObject

        public ItemObject​(int x,
                  int y,
                  ID id,
                  java.lang.String itemName)
        This constructor loads the item into a new GameObject so that it can be used by the handler. This constructor also requests the BufferedImage-object from ItemSprite
        Parameters:
        x - Position on the map
        y - Position on the map
        id - Item ID
        itemName - Item name
        See Also:
        GameObject, Handler, BufferedImage, ItemSprite
